name: stringEvery
description: Determines if all elements of a string satisfy a given condition. Will return `TRUE` is all elements meet the condition, else `FALSE`.

params.name: callback
params.description: The closure function that is executed for each element in the string. The syntax is `callback(element,index,string)`.

lucee.notes: This function is being added in Lucee 6.

links.title: Lucee - LDEV-3181 Ticket to add stringEach
links.description: Lucee ticket to add function in Lucee 6.
